name: Lucky Strike
text: Your luck increases the potency of your weapon attacks.
prerequisites: Base attack bonus +5, adaptive luck racial trait, halfling.
benefit: Spend a use of your adaptive luck racial trait to reroll the damage from a single weapon attack. You deal damage equal to the new damage roll, or the original roll, whichever is greater.
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points instead of a use of adaptable luck to reroll the damage from a single attack.
text_zh: 你的运气使你的武器造成更大的伤害。
prerequisites_zh: BAB+5，【万用幸运】种族特性，半身人。
benefit_zh: 使用一次【万用幸运】特性，你在一次伤害检定时骰两次并取较好者。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗5点耐力而不是万用幸运的次数来重投单次攻击的伤害骰。
